outline:
1. goods, good things, goodness
    1. good things
    2. goods, property
    3. fairness, beauty, joy, prosperity, goodness (abstract)
    4. goodness (of taste, discernment)
    5. goodness (of God) (abstract)
kjv_def: fair, gladness, good(-ness, thing, -s), joy, go well with.
strongs_def: good (as a noun), in the widest sense, especially goodness (superlative concretely, the best), beauty, gladness, welfare
